text: "Beautiful Life" is a song recorded by Swedish pop group Ace of Base. It was released October 20, 1995, from the album The Bridge (1995). It is an optimistic song about appreciating the little things in life. It is a more uptempo song when compared to the group's other hits, which are more mid- tempo. It was written by group member Jonas Berggren with John Ballard. The song was produced by Berggren with Max Martin and Denniz Pop, who would later produce many teen pop songs by new artists like *NSYNC and Britney Spears later in the 1990s. The song reached the top twenty in the UK and US and the top three in Canada. ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:House songs Category:Ace of Base songs
title: Beautiful Life (song)
